it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.communication.commons

Class ResponseMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.cg11.communication.commons.ResponseMessage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class ResponseMessage
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Is the class of the object that the server sends to the client to communicate the outcome of the command it send, together with a message when needed (for example: send cause of negative outcome, result of query)
    Author:
    GerlandoSavio, Matteo Pagliari
    See Also:
